Tested on the above readers with no problems on laptop and Android tablet. Please allow a couple seconds for the seedboxes to kick in, then it should move pretty quick.
Hope it helps in your studies. Go for it! :D

_____________________________________________________________________________________


This concise book has been designed in such a way that the common emergency conditions are detailed to the extent so that surgical students or the casualty doctors or young surgeons may not miss the diagnosis.It cannot replace the many well-established textbooks, but it gives sufficient information for a clinician to manage the emergency.Color photographs are useful add-ons to these chapters, which will make the reader remember the information for a long time.Every new doctor who is resident in the casualty and the intensive care unit will face with a variety of clinical problems, and I hope the handbook will come handy.
